TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PrincipalContext extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 封裝用以執行所有作業的伺服器或網域、這些作業的基底容器，以及作業執行時使用的認證。

span.span: Encapsulates the server or domain against which all operations are performed, the container that is used as the base of those operations, and the credentials used to perform the operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜尋作業的主體的內容定義搜尋基底，並插入作業的內容會定義要插入之物件的容器。For search operations, the principal context defines the search base, and for insert operations the context defines the container into which the object is inserted.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式執行的參數和伺服器驗證，但不是嘗試驗證認證。The constructors perform validation of the parameters and server, but not do not attempt to validate credentials. 主體內容物件建立時未指定容器，它可用來代表多個不同的容器。When the principal context object is created without specifying a container, it may be used to represent multiple distinct containers. 一個容器可能用做為查詢作業的基底，而其他的容器可保存新建立的主體物件。One container may be used as the base of query operations, while additional containers can hold newly-created principal objects. 比方說，當使用者或群組會插入到網域內容型別中，帳戶管理 API 會使用預設的已知的使用者容器中，"CN = Users，DC = Fabrikam，DC = com"。For example, when users or groups are inserted into the domian context type, the Account Management API uses the default well-known user container, "CN=Users,DC=Fabrikam,DC=com". 當存放區中插入電腦時，API 會使用預設值"CN = Computers，DC = Fabrikam，DC = com"容器。When computers are inserted in the store, the API uses the default "CN=Computers,DC=Fabrikam,DC=com" container. 請注意，網域系統管理員可以變更預設容器名稱。Note that the default container names can be changed by the domain administrator. 主體物件的建構函式只能指定一個主體的內容，因為其他的內容會公開做為預設行為，應用程式建立的網域內容，但是未指定容器時。Since the principal object constructors can only specify one principal context, additional contexts are exposed as the default behavior when the application creates a domain context without specifying a container. 應用程式目錄並沒有已知的容器，因為應用程式必須在建構函式中指定的容器或就會擲回。Since the application directory does not have well-known containers, the application must specify a container in the constructor or the is thrown. 由於 SAM 沒有容器，如果應用程式會嘗試在建構函式中指定的容器，會擲回。Since SAM does not have containers, a is thrown if the application attempts to specify a container in the constructor. 每個版本會採用使用者名稱做為參數的建構函式中`userName`字串可以採用各種不同的格式。In each version of the constructor that takes a user name as a parameter, the `userName` string can be in various different formats. 針對三個支援的 NameFormats 是 Nt4Name、 UserPrincipalName 和 SamAccountName。The three supported NameFormats for are Nt4Name, UserPrincipalName, and SamAccountName. 如需有關名稱格式的詳細資訊，請參閱 ADS_NAME_TYPE_ENUM 文件[此處](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99942)。For more information about name formats, see the ADS_NAME_TYPE_ENUM documentation [here](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99942).

param.name: contextType
param.span: 列舉型別值，指定主體內容的存放區類型。

span.span: A enumeration value specifying the type of store for the principal context.

summary.span: 使用指定的內容型別，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified context type.

exception.span: 使用應用程式目錄內容時必須指定名稱或容器。

span.span: A name or container must be specified when using the application directory context.

span.span: The parameter does not contain a valid enumeration value.

MemberSignature.Value: public PrincipalContext (System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType contextType, string name);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType contextType, string name) cil managed
public: PrincipalContext(System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::ContextType contextType, System::String ^ name);
new System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext : System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType * string -> System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext

param.name: contextType
param.span: 列舉型別值，指定主體內容的存放區類型。

span.span: A enumeration value specifying the type of store for the principal context.

param.name: name
param.span: 內容型別的網域或伺服器之名稱、 內容型別的電腦名稱，或是裝載 執行個體的伺服器和通訊埠之名稱。

span.span: The name of the domain or server for context types, the machine name for context types, or the name of the server and port hosting the instance.

param.span: 如果 內容型別的名稱為 null，則這個內容是使用者主體網域的網域控制項，執行緒就是在這個網域之下執行。

span.span: If the name is null for a context type this context is a domain controller for the domain of the user principal under which the thread is running.

param.span: 如果 內容型別的名稱為 null，這就是本機電腦的名稱。

span.span: If the name is null for a context type, this is the local machine name.

param.span: 內容型別的這個參數不能是 null。

span.span: This parameter cannot be null for context types.

summary.span: 使用指定的內容型別和名稱，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified context type and name.

exception.span: 當 指定於 參數中時，必須指定名稱。

span.span: A name must be specified when is specified in the parameter.

exception.span: 參數不包含有效的 列舉值。

span.span: The parameter does not contain a valid enumeration value.

new System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext : System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType * string * string -> System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext

param.name: contextType
param.span: 列舉型別值，指定主體內容的存放區類型。

span.span: A enumeration value specifying the type of store for the principal context.

param.name: name
param.span: 內容型別的網域或伺服器之名稱、 內容型別的電腦名稱，或是裝載 執行個體的伺服器和通訊埠之名稱。

span.span: The name of the domain or server for context types, the machine name for context types, or the name of the server and port hosting the instance.

param.span: 如果 內容型別的名稱為 null，則這個內容是使用者主體網域的網域控制項，執行緒就是在這個網域之下執行。

span.span: If the name is null for a context type this context is a domain controller for the domain of the user principal under which the thread is running.

param.span: 如果 內容型別的名稱為 null，這就是本機電腦的名稱。

span.span: If the name is null for a context type, this is the local machine name.

param.span: 內容型別的這個參數不能是 null。

span.span: This parameter cannot be null for context types.

param.name: container
param.span: 存放區上的容器，當做內容的根項目使用。

span.span: The container on the store to use as the root of the context.

param.span: 所有查詢都在此根目錄下執行，而所有插入都在此容器中執行。

span.span: All queries are performed under this root, and all inserts are performed into this container.

param.span: 對於 和 內容型別，這個參數是容器物件的辨別名稱。

span.span: For and context types, this parameter is the distinguished name of a container object.

param.span: 對於 內容型別，這個參數必須設定為 null。

span.span: For context types, this parameter must be set to null.

summary.span: 使用指定的內容型別、名稱和容器，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified context type, name, and container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連接到伺服器，如果針對指定容器的後續目錄作業呼叫中可能會擲回主體的內容不是有效的容器。The may be thrown in subsequent directory operations calls that connect to the server if the container specified for a principal context is not a valid container. 容器會定義物件，其結構描述類別主體的類別，為使用者、 群組或電腦，其 possibleInferiors 屬性中的。A container is defined as an object whose schema class has the principal classes, either user, group, or computer, in its possibleInferiors attribute.

exception.span: 當 內容型別指定於 參數中時，無法指定容器。

span.span: A container cannot be specified when the context type is specified in the parameter.

exception.span: 當 指定於 參數中時，必須指定名稱或容器。

span.span: A name or container must be specified when is specified in the parameter.

exception.span: 參數不包含有效的 列舉值。

span.span: The parameter does not contain a valid enumeration value.

span.span: If this parameter is null, the default options are ContextOptions.Negotiate | ContextOptions.Signing | ContextOptions.Sealing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連接到伺服器，如果針對指定容器的後續目錄作業呼叫中可能會擲回主體的內容不是有效的容器。The may be thrown in subsequent directory operations calls that connect to the server if the container specified for a principal context is not a valid container. 容器會定義物件，其結構描述類別主體的類別，為使用者、 群組或電腦，其 possibleInferiors 屬性中的。A container is defined as an object whose schema class has the principal classes, either user, group, or computer, in its possibleInferiors attribute.

exception.span: 參數不包含有效 列舉值的組合。

span.span: The parameter does not contain a combination of valid enumeration values.

param.name: userName
param.span: 用來連接至存放區的使用者名稱。

span.span: The username used to connect to the store.

param.span: 如果 username 和 參數都是 null，就會使用目前處理序的認證。

span.span: If the username and parameters are both null, the credentials of the current process are used.

param.span: 否則，username 和 一定為非 null，並會使用它們指定的認證來連接存放區。

span.span: Otherwise, both username and must be non-null, and the credentials they specify are used to connect to the store.

param.name: password

span.span: Otherwise, both username and must be non-null, and the credentials they specify are used to connect to the store.

span.span: The name of the domain or server for context types, the machine name for context types, or the name of the server and port hosting the instance.

param.span: 如果 內容型別的名稱為 null，則這個內容是使用者主體網域的網域控制項，執行緒就是在這個網域之下執行。

span.span: If the name is null for a context type this context is a domain controller for the domain of the user principal under which the thread is running.

param.span: 如果 內容型別的名稱為 null，這就是本機電腦的名稱。

span.span: If the name is null for a context type, this is the local machine name.

param.span: 內容型別的這個參數不能是 null。

span.span: This parameter cannot be null for context types.

param.name: container
param.span: 存放區上的容器，當做內容的根項目使用。

span.span: The container on the store to use as the root of the context.

param.span: 所有查詢都在此根目錄下執行，而所有插入都在此容器中執行。

span.span: All queries are performed under this root, and all inserts are performed into this container.

param.span: 對於 和 內容型別，這個參數是容器物件的辨別名稱。

span.span: For and context types, this parameter is the distinguished name of a container object.

param.span: 對於 內容型別，這個參數必須設定為 null。

span.span: For context types, this parameter must be set to null.

param.name: options
param.span: 一個或多個 列舉值的組合，供選項用來繫結至伺服器。

span.span: A combination of one or more enumeration values the options used to bind to the server.

param.span: 如果這個參數為 null，預設選項為 ContextOptions.Negotiate | ContextOptions.Signing | ContextOptions.Sealing。

span.span: If this parameter is null, the default options are ContextOptions.Negotiate | ContextOptions.Signing | ContextOptions.Sealing.

param.name: userName
param.span: 用來連接至存放區的使用者名稱。

span.span: The username used to connect to the store.

param.span: 如果 username 和 參數都是 null，就會使用目前主體的預設認證。

span.span: If the username and parameters are both null, the default credentials of the current principal are used.

param.span: 否則，username 和 一定為非 null，並會使用它們指定的認證來連接存放區。

span.span: Otherwise, both username and must be non-null, and the credentials they specify are used to connect to the store.

param.name: password
param.span: 用來連接遠端存放區的密碼。

span.span: The password used to connect to the store.

param.span: 如果 username 和 參數都是 null，就會使用目前主體的預設認證。

span.span: If the username and parameters are both null, the default credentials of the current principal are used.

param.span: 否則，username 和 一定為非 null，並會使用它們指定的認證來連接存放區。

span.span: Otherwise, both username and must be non-null, and the credentials they specify are used to connect to the store.

summary.span: 使用指定的內容型別、名稱、容器、內容選項、使用者名稱和密碼，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified context type, name, container, context options, username, and password.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連接到伺服器，如果針對指定容器的後續目錄作業呼叫中可能會擲回主體的內容不是有效的容器。The may be thrown in subsequent directory operations calls that connect to the server if the container specified for a principal context is not a valid container. 容器會定義物件，其結構描述類別主體的類別，為使用者、 群組或電腦，其 possibleInferiors 屬性中的。A container is defined as an object whose schema class has the principal classes, either user, group, or computer, in its possibleInferiors attribute.

exception.span: 和 參數必須是 null 或內含值。

span.span: The and parameters must either be null or contain a value.

exception.span: 當 內容型別指定於 參數中時，無法指定容器。

span.span: A container cannot be specified when the context type is specified in the parameter.

exception.span: 當 指定於 參數中時，必須指定名稱或容器。

span.span: A name or container must be specified when is specified in the parameter.

exception.span: 參數不包含有效的 列舉值。

span.span: The parameter does not contain a valid enumeration value.

exception.span: 參數不包含有效 列舉值的組合。

span.span: The parameter does not contain a combination of valid enumeration values.

span.span: The name of the server to which the principal context is connected or null if the principal context is not connected to a server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當內容類型是，這個屬性會傳回網域控制站或應用程式的目錄執行個體的名稱。When the context type is , this property returns the name of the domain controller or application directory instance. 當內容類型是，這個屬性會傳回電腦名稱。When the context type is , this property returns the machine name.

summary.span: 取得建構函式中之容器參數指定的值。

span.span: Gets the value specified in the container parameter in the constructor.

value.span: 存放區中要做為內容根項目的容器，如果未指定容器則為 null。

span.span: The container on the store to use as the root of the context or null if the container is not specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有查詢都在此根目錄下執行，而所有插入都在此容器中執行。All queries are performed under this root, and all inserts are performed into this container. 針對和內容型別，這個屬性是容器物件的辨別的名稱。For and context types, this property is the distinguished name of a container object. 針對內容型別，這個屬性必須是 null。For context types, this property must be null.

summary.span: 取得內容型別，這個內容型別指定主體內容的存放區型別。

span.span: Gets the context type that specifies the type of store for the principal context.

value.span: 列舉值，指定要連接之目標的型別。

span.span: A enumeration value specifying the type of target to connect to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式不是直接建立主體的內容和指定的內容型別時，會使用這個屬性。This property is used when the application does not directly create the principal context and specify the context type. 例如，當應用程式列舉群組成員資格，此屬性可用來判斷主體所屬存放區的型別。For example, when the application enumerates group membership, this property can be used to determine the type of store to which the principal belongs.

summary.span: 取得建構函式中之使用者名稱參數指定的值。

value.span: 用來連接存放區的使用者名稱，如果沒有使用者名稱則為 null。

span.span: The username used to connect to the store, or null if no user name exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以設定任何一種各種不同的格式傳遞的使用者名稱。This property can be set by passing it a user name in any one of various different formats. 可接受的格式類型的完整清單，請參閱 ADS_NAME_TYPE_ENUM 文件[此處](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99942)。For a complete list of the acceptable types of formats, see the ADS_NAME_TYPE_ENUM documentation [here](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99942).

summary.span: 建立與伺服器的連接，並在連接成功時驗證指定的認證。

span.span: Creates the connection to the server and validates the specified credentials if the connection is successful.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `userName`在這兩個多載，這個方法的引數必須採用格式*使用者名稱*(例如*mcampbell*) 而非*domain\username*或*使用者名稱\@網域*。The `userName` argument in both overloads of this method must take the form *username* (for example, *mcampbell*) rather than *domain\username* or *username\@domain*.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法繫結至建構函式中指定的伺服器。The method binds to the server specified in the constructor. 如果`username`並`password`引數是`null`，這個方法會驗證目前主體的預設認證。If the `username` and `password` arguments are `null`, this method validates the default credentials for the current principal. `userName`引數必須採用格式*使用者名稱*(例如*mcampbell*) 而非*網域 \ 使用者名稱*或*username\@網域*。The `userName` argument must take the form *userName* (for example, *mcampbell*) rather than *domain\username* or *username\@domain*.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法繫結至建構函式中指定的伺服器。The method binds to the server specified in the constructor. 如果`username`和`password`參數都是 null，這個方法會驗證目前主體的預設認證。If the `username` and `password` parameters are null, this method validates the default credentials for the current principal. `userName`引數必須採用格式*使用者名稱*(例如*mcampbell*) 而非*網域 \ 使用者名稱*或*username\@網域*。The `userName` argument must take the form *username* (for example, *mcampbell*) rather than *domain\username* or *username\@domain*.
